query: Click on the 'Remove' button located beneath the item in the cart to remove it.

result.chunks:
----
click on the 'remove' link or button to clear the shopping cart or navigate to the shopping cart page and clear the current cart contents.
result.content: click on the 'remove' link or button to clear the shopping cart or navigate to the shopping cart page and clear the current cart contents.

location: Relative Location: The buttons are located near the bottom-right corner of the screen, below the product listing and above the "Save for later" option.
Absolute Location: They are situated in the middle-lower part of the screen, near the bottom.
shape: The buttons are rectangular with rounded corners, displaying white text on a red background.
